name: BLOCKOLI
description:
BLOCKOLI is a game made in a team of three for a class assignment - we were to turn our previous assignment about creating specific game mechanics, and turn it into a full fledged game. Play as a broccoli samurai to kill all of your assassins, ninja fruits!

This game is the result of trying out many different systematic designs and programming styles.
Music is Fiery Pursuit by Yu-Peng Chen of Hoyo-Mix, I do not own this music at all. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=APfOOqVZAdw

All rights reserved - no money will be charged for this project.

= = = = = TEAMMATES = = = = =
Quaso is a team of three,
Mez, Yudoufu, and Tamanegi-K'
